snippet: COHEN--Sanford. The City College of New York mourns the passing of Sanford Cohen who graduated in 1959 with a BS in Electrical Engineering. A champion of urban education, his generosity and foresight allowed City College to establish scholarships for aspiring public school teachers in honor of his late wife, Barbara Krames Cohen, in the School of Education. The City College extends its condolences to his children, Lisa Cohen Russman, Deborah Cohen and Craig Cohen and to his grandchildren. Dr. Lisa S. Coico, President 1/3
lead_paragraph: COHEN--Sanford. The City College of New York mourns the passing of Sanford Cohen who graduated in 1959 with a BS in Electrical Engineering. A champion of urban education, his generosity and foresight allowed City College to establish scholarships for aspiring public school teachers in honor of his late wife, Barbara Krames Cohen, in the School of Education. The City College extends its condolences to his children, Lisa Cohen Russman, Deborah Cohen and Craig Cohen and to his grandchildren. Dr. Lisa S. Coico, President 1/3
